meaningMnemonic: You <radical>change</radical> this <radical>geoduck</radical> because you want it to <kanji>lean</kanji>. Right now it's standing up straight, but you want it to lean to one side instead.
readingMnemonic: To get the geoduck to <kanji>lean</kanji> you put a piece of <reading>ca</reading>ke (けい) on one of its sides.
